clip.quote: He saved this client $100,000 in his negotiation.
clip.why_clipworthy: Demonstrates the tangible benefits of using video to highlight negotiation skills.
clip.suggested_hook: Want to save your clients thousands? Here's how video can showcase your negotiation prowess.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "Want to save your clients thousands? Here's how video can showcase your negotiation prowess.",
    "SETUP": "Meet Kim Rittberg, a real estate pro who knows the power of video. She shares how one agent saved a client $100,000 through negotiation.",
    "INSIGHT": "By using video, this agent highlighted his negotiation skills, building trust and showcasing his expertise. Clients saw firsthand how he navigated complex deals, leading to significant savings.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "Incorporating video into your strategy can demonstrate your unique skills. Show potential clients your value before they even meet you.",
    "CTA": "Ready to elevate your brand? Start creating video content today and watch your client engagement soar!"
  },
  "CAPTION": "Showcase your negotiation skills with video and save your clients thousands! #RealEstateTips",
  "HASHTAGS": ["#RealEstate", "#VideoMarketing", "#NegotiationSkills", "#ClientEngagement", "#RealEstateAgent"],
  "CONTENT_PILLAR": "top_producer_secrets"
}
```

clip.quote: Video more than photos, more than text content, is the most shared content on social media.
clip.why_clipworthy: Highlights the effectiveness of video in increasing social media engagement.
clip.suggested_hook: Did you know video is the most shared content on social media? Here's why you should be using it.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "Did you know video is the most shared content on social media? Here's why you should be using it.",
    "SETUP": "I'm Kim Rittberg, and today we're diving into why real estate agents need to embrace video. It's not just a trend; it's a game-changer.",
    "INSIGHT": "Video content is 1200% more likely to be shared than text and images combined. It boosts engagement, enhances personal branding, and drives lead generation. Imagine your listings reaching more potential buyers effortlessly.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "By incorporating video, you not only showcase properties but also build trust and authenticity with clients. It's your chance to stand out in a crowded market.",
    "CTA": "Ready to elevate your real estate game? Start creating video content today and watch your engagement soar!"
  },
  "CAPTION": "Video is king on social media! Discover how it can transform your real estate business. üé•üè°",
  "HASHTAGS": ["#RealEstateTips", "#VideoMarketing", "#SocialMediaStrategy", "#LeadGeneration", "#PersonalBranding"],
  "CONTENT_PILLAR": "top_producer_secrets"
}
```
